text: perspective that's like yeah okay something huge is going on here it's just too early to tell I believe now the other thing is looking back over the past couple days this week for context we can see that well one I don't know why oh I guess the data from today isn't integrated yet I don't know why that oh cuz I didn't include today cuz I'm an idiot I was wondering why the volume wasn't there I meant to click this I was like where did everything go uh it's right here so as we looked back through the the rest of this week there was definitely some bigger trades but just overall lighter premium sizing and this has been the case for weeks now we're still seeing things over 100,000 pretty regularly but nothing nothing too noteworthy in my opinion so very very fun I'm very curious to know what you all think the the post was today what that was all about it doesn't look like there's crazy options activity going on in here just yet we know that there was a lot of stock activity going on without a doubt because volume shot up as people were trading but we have to see where it goes from here so let me know what you think the Tweet or X was all about and then also where you think price is going from here and do we close above 30 tomorrow that's the big question as
